channel.title: new challenge on Carlos Buenosvinos
channel.description: Recent content in new challenge on Carlos Buenosvinos

item.title: Hi @xing_bcn and @xing_de!
item.description: After leaving Atrápalo, it’s time to jump to a new challenge. As I explained, I need to get out of my confort zone and check other things that will make me learn new things. Some of you already know, but for the rest, the chosen company is Xing. So, I’m more than happy to announce that I’m the next B2B Head of Engineering at @xing. I’d like to share some thoughts about the reasons that took me here.
